item.title: Hacktoberfest | Let's go for 2019
item.description: Once again, I’m participate to the 2019 edition of the Hacktoberfest. This month, I will focus on my open-source projects byteslice, a go library to manipulate a byte array, hoff, a go library to run workflows with high order functions - a new name is required :) , and the new one bitframe, a go library to manipulate bit frames using data protocol with encoder and decoder capabilities. But I don’t forget to also work on my shell project : michel.
